title: # Beyond the West Pass | New region Hexi
text:
# Beyond the West Pass | New region Hexi
Our longing for home endures as the moon shines over the Jade Gate.
Step into Hexi’s boundless realms, from Jade Gate's flying sands, Liangzhou's pale snows to Qinchuan's timeless trails.

New Region Hexi—Coming March 6 (UTC)! @everyone

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LmvbWN4CZY4

Hexi Expansion Announcement Trailer

New Region Hexi—Coming March 6 (UTC)!

Our longing for home endures as the moon shines over the Jade Gate.
Steps into a timeless journey across Hexi’s boundless realms, from Jade Gate's flying sands, Liangzhou's pale snows to Qinchuan's timeless trails.

author: Where Winds Meet

title: Server Maintenance Notice
text:
# Server Maintenance Notice
Time: 2026. 02. 06. 12:00–2026. 02. 06. 12:30 @Game Updates 

The server will be offline for maintenance during this 30-minute window. During this time, login and gameplay will be unavailable. We expect to be back online by 2026. 02. 06. 12:30:00 which is 55 perc ezelőtt . We will post updates if the maintenance window changes. We apologize for the inconvenience this may cause and thank you for your patience and understanding.
author: armoredsoldiers

title: Bugfixes on Feb 6
text:
Bugfixes on Feb 6
The issue with patch update stalling at 90% has been fixed. If the issue persists, please exit the game and install the latest patch via your platform.

The Epic/GeForce login issue will be fixed by <ts>. Thank you for your understanding.
author: Where Winds Meet #game-announcement

title: Hey @Game Updates
text:
Hey @Game Updates 

We are aware of an issue affecting the login process and are actively working to resolve it as quickly as possible.

Additionally, there is a bug that may leave your character stuck if you use the ⁨⁨`"exit"`⁩⁩ to leave a duty or open-world instance. For now, please be cautious about using the exit button after matchmaking or going into the open world. 

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience and support.
author: Where Winds Meet #game-announcement
